baseline_groups.claim_summary: Belief elicitation (beliefon) does not significantly affect round-1 cooperation in finite repeated prisoners dilemma games.
baseline_groups.notes: Finite game sample. Probit with session clustering. Controls: supergame, focoop_m1, fcoop, risk.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Belief elicitation (beliefon) does not significantly affect round-1 cooperation in indefinite repeated prisoners dilemma games.
baseline_groups.notes: Indefinite game sample. Probit with session clustering. Controls: supergame, focoop_m1, fcoop, risk, length_m1.

global_notes: Core finding is null effect of belief elicitation on behavior. Custom specs test different hypotheses and are non-core. Two drop_first_supergame specs produce identical coefficients to baselines suggesting filters had no effect. The no-controls indefinite spec shows sign flip due to omitted variable bias.
